Text:
[II] Jesus, do not abandon those whose hope is in him. We humbly come before you:
[IR] Our God, Hear us.
[I1] Lord Jesus Christ, our light, illuminate your Church,
[I2] that she may proclaim to all nations, the great mystery of our faith, that was manifested in your flesh. 
[I1] Watch over the ministers and leaders of your Church,
[I2] so that they may faithfully proclaim the truth to all people.
[I1] By your blood, you have given peace to the world,
[I2] help us let go of sin that divides us, and end the scourge of war.
[I1] Out of the abundance of your grace sustain the marriages of our siblings in Christ,
[I2] may their unions more perfectly reflect the mystery of your Church.
[I1] Grant to all who have passed the forgiveness of their sins,
[I2] by your mercy, may they live joyously among the saints.
